questions.question: Tyrone stole 46 pieces of chicken from KFC, how much in watermelon does Tyrone have to pay back if 1 watermelon is 2 pieces of chicken?

if a penguin wears a monocle and dances the cha-cha with a walrus while eating 7.5 pounds of sushi, how many jellybeans would it take to balance a see-saw if the walrus weighs 1,200 pounds and the penguin is 10 times lighter? assume the see-saw is perfectly balanced at 6 feet from the pivot on each side, and each jellybean has a mass of 1 gram. (round your answers)
